reviewText: this was an excellent DVD...with parts of the DVD movie inside.  I would recommend it to anyone as a good supplement or a standalone evening entertainment.
Very good fireside interview with the actual missionaries involved.  Now we want to see the movie.  Thanks!

Loved, loved, loved the movie so I had to purchase the fireside. Hearing these two tell the story in their own words is amazing; even better than the film. They both have such incredible faith; I don't think I could've handled the kidnapping as well as they did. The only thing better than this would have been to see the real fireside in person!
